author: Jonah Blocker
title: Dr. Anthony Fauci: “Something Rather Significant Needed To Be Done”
description: This week, Martha is joined by Dr. Anthony Fauci to discuss criticisms of the models for the spread of the virus, the eventual decision to reopen parts of the country, and more.
content:
This week, Martha is joined by Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy & Infectious Diseases and leading member of the Trump administration's coronavirus taskforce.
Martha and Dr. Fauci discuss criticisms of the models and projec… [+270 chars]
